values:
I just got an I love u I missed you today message. It made me feel better. It made me smile. It was nice. <3

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Yesterday was a pretty awesome day.. A little sleepy cause I sacrificed sleep to go see Erin. But it's worth it. Went over to her house around 12:15 this afternoon. Brought her lunch so she wouldn't have to make anything. I know she loves her Taco's =p    we sat and ate and watched Wife Swap (not really what i would like to be watching. But not my choice I guess). After we finished eating, she and I took a shower together and talked and laughed some. Then we got out and got ready for Aiden's first speech therapy appointment. Went pretty well for the most part. He had kind of a rough day so... he was mildly cranky anyways. 

But today was great. I enjoyed my shower with Erin. Just a shower. Nothing more. And we had a little bit of snuggle time on the couch before and after until we had to leave. I hope for more days like today. It was good.

Peace, love, and happiness.. I'm out for the night.

Well.. Had a long conversation with Erin last night. 2hrs to be exact. Lots of stuff was discussed. Which makes me feel good cause we've never been able to do that before. But basically after all of it, she wants me to show her i appreciate her more and acknowledge stuff more. Tell her good things. THEN she will give me more affection and show ME that she loves me. She feels broken. Well i'm broken too. But that hasn't stopped me from pampering her. And doing everything for her for the last 2 months. I screwed up the last couple of weeks. And I'm going to work on that. But I guess nothing i've done thus far was good enough to get her to give anything back to me. Taking her out to eat. Bringing her food all the time. Going to the movies. Going to hobby lobby with her. All the random text messages I sent her. The I love you's. I'm so lost. I slacked off on it and stopped cause I don't feel like i'm getting anywhere. Or acknowledgment back. Why do I have to do everything first. We are both broken. I've spent the last 2 months trying to be there for her. If I have to do everything first, What am I supposed to acknowledge? Why is she always too busy to do anything for me. Or the things I wanted? Yesterday was good. I'm hoping for more of those. And multiplied 20x over

But none the less. After our conversation last night. I'm going to send her random messages. Acknowledge when she does things that make me happy. Tell her that I'm happy we are together. And have faith and hope and wait.

Off to work. Peace out. And have fun.

PS. Turning this journal upside down. Hopefully it will shine and smile. And maybe make my relationship better. Faith.....

Wow. I'm excited. I'm so happy right now. Erin and I talked about some stuff. No arguing. She agreed with me (kind of). She said ok. That was about it. But she didn't disagree with my request. I don't know if that's just cause she wasn't in the mood or if she actually feels that what I said was a good thing. But I really hope she goes through with it. It would really help both. And I'm going to work on my part as well. I am going to be less cranky. She is going to talk to me more. Or send me random messages. Just something comforting if nothing else. Just something like saying that she's happy about us. Or that she loves. Or she can't wait to see me next. Whatever. Anything. *jumps up and down* I'm excited. I hope she does it. I'm happy as hell just thinking about it. =p. =p. =)


Anyways. Not much else has happened. Got aidens last appointment tomorrow showing his results and stuff. Wish us luck.

Almost time to go home. I'm ready. So tired. Had rough nite te last couple of nights. Didn't sleep well. Had bad dreams. Don't really wanna talk about them. But I'm hoping forthe beat. I have faith. I want to see this work. Luvs.

Joe

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

The Used - Earthquake

She had an earthquake on her mind
I almost heard her cry out as I left her far behind
I knew the world was crashing down around her
I sink now to the ocean floor
Cause I know that we are more but I've made this mess
I've built this fire, are you still mine?

Cause baby I'm not all right when you go
I'm not fine, Please be all mine
I never want you to go because I am all yours so please be all mine.

She had an earthquake on her mind
apparently the kind that would bury us alive
by putting all this weight on us forever
I lie here on the ocean floor
Broken castle by the shore and I made this mess
I built this fire, are you still mine?

Cause baby I'm not all right when you go
I'm not fine, Please be all mine
I never want you to go because I am all yours so please be all mine.

Let me save us
I've slaughtered us, I've murdered our love
I can taste it, this blood in my mouth
This knife in my lungs
Have I murdered our love?
Have I murdered our love?

Cause baby I'm not all right when you go
I'm not fine, Please be all mine
I never want you to go because I am all yours so please be all mine.

Cause baby I'm not all right when you
Cause baby I'm not all right when you go
I'm not fine, Please be all mine
I never want you to go because I am all yours so please be all mine.

Please be all mine


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Review about Earthquake
earthquake | Reviewer: nonsense | 5/12/09

my boyfriend and i had a bit of a fall out a few days ago. we have been together, mostly on-and-off, for about three years but had been doing really well lately. we had finally figured eachother out and worked out all the kinks in our relationship. then, just when everything started going smoothly, we get in a fight. not physically, but verbally. i told him to not bother talking to me anymore. we havent talked much, but he did put this song on his profile. im not sure im ready to give him another chance. ive given him SO MANY chances to be the guy he needs to be, and to be there for me. he keeps screwing up. this song means so much to me, but im not ready to keep going on like this.


/: | Reviewer: Jenny | 4/3/09

This song is really great, but it reminds me so much of my ex best friend.
Why is that im not ok without her, shes gone now.
Shes become a whole new person i cant stand, i miss the old best friend i had for 3 years.
I cant even look at her when she walks by, she hurt me so badly.

But I still love this song and i still miss the old her.

Much love to The Used !


Heartbreak | Reviewer: YoungLove | 3/16/09

So, like after 6 months of being together me and my bf broke up but we still had really strong feelings for each other. He called me the next night and said he wants me to listen to this song so I did and I broke down crying. This song means so much to me. I love this song. I'm so happy we got back together after that. :

Finally caught Rose online so I got to talk to her for a little while. She's been pretty much stuck in bed sick. She gets up at odd times and stuff and pretty much takes care of the necessities to pee and maybe snack on some soup and stuff. It was good to get to talk to her. She says she's getting a little better so that's good news. But anyways.. I'm out. Hopefully I can make it through work tonight. Last time I stood up to walk across the house I almost blacked out again and then I threw up. No fun to clean up when you don't feel good. Nite

just a quick one before a fall over dead for however long it may last.

I think I've got myself all together for now. So. Now I seriously probably not gonna write in here until after the 4th. Until after we see what happens Tuesday. It's a big day to me. I will have survived the week and It's the last day I get to spend any straight one on one time with her. I would like it to be special but.. well.. you know how it goes and what I promised. So.. that stays to myself.  Wow everything is spinning. to the bed I go.

Alright. I texted her. I couldnt handle waiting. We talked some more tonight and I feel a little better. She says she understands. It's not that I don't trust her cause I do. I just don't feel as special to her as everyone else. I mean hell she's getting up at 6 o clock for Josh. To go take him to get breakfast. But still. She never does that for me. She stays out til all hours with him. I can hope she will do these things for me in the upcoming future since we are starting a new. It will be NEW YEARS tomorrow. So we will see. Faith.

The other thing I was gonna post was that I really wanted to spend new years with her to signify us starting something new. Something better. To make this work. Just part of it at least but. I'm scared she'll say no because of Josh. So I just pushed it aside and let it go.

Uuewismbrjjfdiifrjsnfohhhhh.. My head. Wooo.. Dizzy. One sec.......

Ok I'm gonna have finish on here for the night.

Out bye

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Uuuggh this is rough. Anyways. 2 more posts to make tonight before I go home 1 of them I will note on now. And that is that I'm for some reason not surprised she hasn't txt me yet. The movie is over. I know why it bothers me so much. And I wish she could understand. I trust her not to make the same mistake. But I can't help but wonder. With all the complaining I do. Trying to get things where we can both be comfortable. But it does worry me. She found something good enough in him over me once. It's just jealousy an insecurities. And I do need to mellow. I really want this to work. But she makes me feel like we are soooooo far apart all the time. And I can't handle it. A relationship is about 2 people being together for each other and supporting each other primarily. And I have to fight her just to get her attention. *deep breath* I'm getting all wound up again. 1:24am. *sigh* so glad anything I say means anything. She'll brush all my feelings off as over reacting and will then just ignore this. =(

Well back to work to get caught up. Talk to you in a bit

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Still no word from Rose. Kind of worries me. She's been sick. She had started feeling better but hasn't been online or anything since. I really hope she's doing better. She said they thought she might have swine flu. Icky. Hope not. But it seems all the symptoms were matching. Tho that doesn't take. Over half of them are te same as a common cold or general flu symptoms. Just more severe. Anyways.

Work is slow and now that I have started writing in my journal again I can't seem to stop. So I kind of lied. Lol I said I wasn't gonna post anything else til the 5th. *shrug* oh well.

Man. No sleep. No food. You get pretty out of it. Keep getting dizzy and spotty. Uuggh

Out

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

So. Apparently I need to just calm down. Forget about myself and anything I need. But according to her she's not asking me to make any sacrifices or to change anything. To me what she is doing requires me to make a big sacrifice on my part. Which I was aware of ok with and will deal with. But you sure don't see me out galavanting with someone I cheated on her with let alone just someone of the opposite sex. Going on dates or hanging out afterhours alone with them. She would have my head. So I hope she really considers what I'm doing for her to make this work. This as well as other stuff. Compromising is still sacrificing. I do it to make her happy. But she is stuck in only what she wants. How do I fix that. I can't do it without her. And I'm trying to make this happen for us. So here goes. *deep breath* *slap face* *shake head* and *deep breath* again.. Whew. Here's to the best to come.

Hoping big for Tuesday cause I'm gonna need it.

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Well from what I'm being told Aiden is sick. And was throwing up. So we are gonna have to reschedule the appointment until later. Guess we will have to wait to find out what the results are. Hope he gets to feeling better. My poor goober.

I at least heard from Erin now so I feel a little better. I will not be posting here again until after the 5th.

Well.. She did finally text me. So that's good. I still feel betrayed and crapped on.

The snow wasn't that bad. almost 2 inches though. But it was white fluffy snow. The kind you make angels in and have snowball fights.   =)  Anyways. So Aiden will still have his appointment at 3:30. Hopefully we will have some results from the testing and will have an idea of where they are planning on going from here. Wish us luck. Peace out.

Man today is gonna be so much fun.. really.. wow.. I don't even know where to start. Did find out all I need to know for now. The rest is out of my reach. Anyways. Just got back from dropping goober kid off at school. Gonna try to lay down. Try yet again to get some sleep. Wow... this sucks. I'm tired but... I just can't fall asleep.

Don't think I've ever worried myslef sick before. Not this literal anyways. Just threw up. Now laying here. Everything feels numb. ..............

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Wow... I remember when she used to actually look this stuff up for me. She saved a whole bunch of it once. Had some really cool ones too.  Unfortunately harddrives are unreliable and we lost most of them a while back. But for old time sake. Just posting. They are old outdated posts from some other users. But they are still live images so.. yaayyyy..

http://community.livejournal.com/anime_love_lust/29981.html#cutid1

http://community.livejournal.com/anime_love_lust/

Well.. looking back you can see that.. well... things haven't changed much.

http://maddog518.livejournal.com/

Ran across my old journal looking at anime links from erin's profile. Fancy that it's all still pretty much the same ol' shit. Just another damn day. Is it really possible it is going to get better? Starting with Yesterday. Who knows. Cause I don't anymore.
Well... guess what. I'm still awake. I can't shake this bad feeling. And the worst part. I'll never know.

I can't believe I'm letting her do this to me... Again. Why am I so fucking stupid. I guess because down inside I still cared. But here I am. Being torn apart. Again. Shredded to death. Why? why? why?

I've shed my tears. I'm done for now. Hopefully I will sleep.

Damn I'm good. I knew it. Somehow. I just knew. And now that the jealousy has boiled a hole in my brain. I'm going to go play rock band or something noisy. Or maybe I should call her instead. Nah.. I ain't that important. Noise sounds better. Toodles.

Kid picked out to watch "All Dogs go to Heaven"... Been a long time since i've seen that one. LoL. Well.. he is in bed. Watching the end of it. All tucked in with his superior cuteness.

Well tomorrow is gonna be interesting. Gotta figure out how I want to do this so that I'm not tired as hell for work tomorrow. Probably end up just playing it by ear as usual.

Well.. I'm out for now to make sure kid is laying down and going to sleep.
I bet.. she doesn't call or text me until after 10 PM when she has to be home.

Sitting here with Aiden watching him play his silly games. Trying to show him how to do what he needs to. Silly kid. Guess we aren't going bowling. Maybe on Sunday instead. Gonna go lay down and watch him play. Gotta make dinner in an hour. Spaghetti sounds good. Will feed the 3 of us. Talk to you later on.

Well I feel a little better. But I just can't seem to unwind. The fact that she pays more attention to her friends than she does me just drives me nuts. It makes me jealous and crazy. She texts her friends all the time. She doesn't have any problem hugging them and giving them all the attention in the world. She'll do just about anything her friends mention. So what makes me different? I don't understand. Why can't I get her to do anything? I do anything she asks. But get not much.

I would say why am I don't know why I'm crying. But I already know why. I don't know what to do though. Why does she put me through this. What does she see in me. All I'm going to do is make her life miserable. As long as she isn't giving in return, As long as I am miserable. I will continue to wear into her about the same things. She says she misses me. Why? What does she miss? All I do is gripe and complain about things. Apparently for no reason it feels like. Try to talk about it and it just ends up being because I'm doing something wrong. Never because what she may be doing. I want this to work. But she has to work with me. She said she would if I came back. 

And after the week. The next obstacle, Will be that she will be back in school. Which of course means she will no longer have time for me. Again. Which gives me the 1 day with her. Tuesday. *sigh*

Well good fucking morning to you too. So after our long conversation last night. She doesn't talk to me for like 3 hours. When that entire conversation was about how little attention she pays to me. Fancy that. No text message or anything this morning to say good morning when she got up. Nothing. I got up this morning. Turned on my computer. And took Mica outside and walked down to get the mail and drop off my netflix movies. I finally get a phone call 5 minutes before she has to leave and she's yelling at me. Cause she can't get her printer to work so she can't print directions. I tried to help but she just kept yelling at me with everything i suggested. Why she didn't take care of this last night, who knows. She said she tried. I don't think she did. Knowing that she was playing Sims and probably talking to Josh about picking him up today I could be wrong. But if she was having problems with it she didn't ask me last night. That's for sure. So ya.. gonna be a wonderful lousy ass day. I feel worthless. Good day. Probably won't post again til tonight. Maybe it will be happier then. I will have Aiden. I'm excited. My goofy kid.

------This is for yesterdays post----------------

Was a little off yesterday evening so i didn't feel like posting. Aiden's appointment went really well apparently. Which was good. He Finished his test and we will find out the results on Wednesday hopefully. I have an appointment with his psychiatrist today to answer a few questions about Aiden's behaviors when he's over at my house. Which should go pretty well. I don't typically have many issues when he's at my house with me. He does his thing and has fun. He gets in trouble from time to time as any 4 yr old would. But otherwise is a good kid. 

Had another express my feelings conversation last night. Ya. You can imagine how that went. Basically. I have to lay down everything. Get nothing. Give her everything until she's happy again/or comfortable. Then I can have something in return.  She's says that's not what she said but basically, really, it is. I did tell her though that I would be not cranky about stuff and when she does show affection i would show it back. She says she needs support and not nagging. Wouldn't me telling her what I and need and talking to her about what she needs be support? Unless by support... again... she means walking blindly, keeping my mouth shut, and just doing what she wants. She has this misconstrued idea that i've wronged her so much worse. Which is partially true. Tho mine is gone. Her's is not. And me having to deal with that. Ya. The effects and emotional hurt that causes me doesn't seem to bother her at all either. But I guess we'll see how it goes. I'm trusting that she took in something i said last night and that things will start to improve. Not trying to trust. Doing it. 

Anyways.. enough of that. I'll post to you later. Night night.

Well.. I was correct. I left it on the counter of the movie theatre. I calle up there and they were holding it for me. So we drove up the and got it. Thankfully.

Turned in the papers for my child support today.. Ohh goodie. So much for being not broke and trying to get back on my feet. What can ya do? Push forward I guess.

Last thing on the agenda today is taking Aiden to his psychiatrist appointment. Will hopefully only take about an hour or so. Then headed home. Gonna watch sleepy hollows and then send my netflix movies back for more. Other than that guess I'm just gonna chillax and mellow out. Gonna be a loooonnngg week. But for now. I'm out. Laterz

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

What a great way to start my already going to be wonderful week. It would appear that I can't find my debit card. I'm racking my brain trying to remember if I picked it up after they screwed up my Root Beer last night at the movie theatre. I don't remember but I can't find it. Yayyy me. Doesn't help being tired as crap either. Was up late last night. Had to get up early this morning to take mah kiddo to school. Well.. i'm out for now. Peace

Having breakfast with mom at iHop.. Mmm. Yummy. I'm enjoying breakfast. Talking to mom. Catching up on stuff. Anyways.. Food is here so I'm out..

Posted via LiveJournal.app.

Well. Today was alright. Other than being unsatisfyingly miserable and not being able to do anything about it. And now it's gonna be at least another week before anything can be done. Unless I do it myself. Which I don't want to... *sigh* It's rather frustrating. The hurt and lack of sleep have made me cranky. I still wonder how this is all gonna work out. I'm just more touchy feely romantic spend as much time as possible together type person. A hopeless sappy romantic basically. I'm more of an it's all about you type person. I want do as much as possible together. I want to hold you as much as possible. You are in my every thought. Everything i think about doing. You're there. And where am I in yours? If I'm anywhere near the top, then it sure isn't shown very well.

Anyways... So we went and watched the new Sherlock Holmes movie. It was good. I liked it. Boy was a little wormy and didn't want to sit down. Had a good day lounging with Aiden and Erin. We played some games with Aiden. I got Sims 3 re-installed and so far my computer seems to be behaving thus far. Hopefully it stays that way. Well... probably gonna stay up for a couple hours and then off to bed.. been a long day.

Well. Finished doing crap around the house for now. Time to be lazy again..  =)

Oh and yayyyyy for me.. I got my computer up and running again. *crossing fingers* Hoping it's not what I think it is tho. Cause my video may be dieing. But I don't know yet. I did a few things and it is running fine now. So.. We'll see how it goes.

Alright. Theme changed to a mocha flavor  =)   Still not as bright as I would have liked but. Brighter than my norm. You get into the brighter ones and it's hard to read or they look too girly. So. Mocha it is for now.

Torn between so many themes. Surprisingly I found a lot of themes I liked. Some dark and some light. Found more that were neutral than anything. And a couple of darker one's that were really cool. Maybe I'll use them later. It's time for something a little brighter going into the New Year's. To show that I can and will do better this year. With, or without anyone else.

Looking through themes... Let's do something different.. It's time to change some shit in my life. New Year's is coming. So let's start just a little bit early. Get a head start... Will post when I decide on a change.

Well, here it goes again. Up and down and mixed emotions. I took this opportunity with open arms and full awareness of what's to come. But I am hoping for the best anyways. It doesn't look all that promising right now. And only seems to be getting worse. Not much really seems to have changed. And it seems anytime I bring up problems/or how I feel about something, there's always something wrong with her and she doesn't want to talk about it or she just blows it off entirely. She then off course just says that I don't notice the things she does. I can see efforts being made on some things. But that's a different post for another day. Her statement of I should just take her how she is, which basically forces me to be the one that has to change and never her, doesn't really help the situation any. I tried talking to her about things a couple nights ago. She of course didn't want to talk when I wanted to. When something was weighing on me. When I needed her. She always has an excuse. It's always something. So what am i suppose to do.. hell if I know. 

Only other thing going on right now is this week. But i'm not even going to get into how this week is gonna go. I'm hoping it doesn't go too bad. Again I have in my mind about how it's gonna go but i'm not saying it here. I'm giving it a chance to be OK. Yet another thing that I am sacrificing and willing to accept. And she doesn't' even seem to care what it does to me. But wish me luck. *crosses fingers*

Friend wise everything is great. We are back to normal anyways. Talking, laughing, hanging out with Aiden etc. We've went to see a few movies. Had Christmas with her and Aiden at her parents house yesterday. It was fun. Got to watch my spoiled kid open all his presents. Of course then shortly after they get handed to me.. So i can open the iron-bound toy and put batteries in it. LoL.

I'm so anxious right now. I am ready to have my family back under one roof. Erin and I have sealed the deal for our place this weekend. we should be moving in on friday.

I'm both exciting and nervous. I'm also a little scared. Last 2 or 3 days haven't been so well. I cried saturday afternoon from frustration and pressure. Not to mention my lack of sleep lately. But everything is ok now. It wasn't a huge deal. but it seemed like I was messing things up for three days in a row.

I'm also a little concerned about the bills. she's trying to get a job again. even part time is ok. if she gets full time that would be good too.. then we would have extra money padding to put and use for traveling or family outtings etc.

we'll work it out I'm sure. but we are also internetless for now as well :( we can't wow together.

one other thing that is bothering me.. and this with or without moving in and more of just personal thing. I know in my mind that I think that wanting to make love to my wife is ok. but sometimes I think I want it too much. and maybe its just because she dosnt want it as much as I do? but it'll be fine... I'm hoping maybe I will get to have that time a little more often and do my part to ask/bother less.

anyways.. I ran out of time. I've got to get back to work.

Well... both houses we were looking at have been filled. guess its back to the papers. see what else I can find. which I plan to stay home tomorrow and be making some calls throughout the afternoon. wanting to find something soon. I atleast know how much my tax refund is now so I know what to budget for. ema's mom will help but we will have to pay her back. which I am ok with.

Unfortunately my taxes weren't as much this year as I had hoped for so I'm not going to be able to pay off everything I had planned to pay. but at least ema and I will be back together. hoping she will be able to get a part time job to help out a little. I feel uncomfortable with paying her bills to in my budget. not sure if I will make enough for her to not work at all. but it would be nice.. then I could spend lots of time with her and aiden. even on my night schedule. I am ok with her staying home as long as we are able to afford it like planned and she helps take care of the house while she is home.

its all just a wait and see sort of deal unfortunately. anyways.. gonna eat my lunch so I can head back to work.

LatEs

I know.. I missed a day.. so sue me.. you won't get much anyways. :)

things are going well. Planning to move hopefully within the next couple weeks, as long as things work out. I'm so excited. I'll finally get to be with Ema and Aiden again. My silly Aiden. I miss them so much. Hopefully this time around will be better than last.

We are doing better. and I've been able to talk to her about things without them turning into arguments. So those are good signs. She still tends to 'blame' me for stuff like earlier today she commented on how I shouldn't have bought guitar hero. but so far nothing worse than little pointy finger stuff like that.

Anyways, I'm gonna run.. gotta head back to work.

LaTErZ

Well.. today was a fairly good day.. ran some errands with Ema. Went to see my sister. She's doing good apparently. She seemed happy and in a good mood. Though I found out that my Dad is getting back together with my stepmom and I think my Dad is stupid for that, but I can understand why. She cheated on him though and that bothers me. But its not my life or my choice. I have my own problems/tasks to deal with. Which are going well at the moment.

I also made a splurge for myself. I went ahead and bought Guitar Hero 3 to play. We'll see how that goes but I'm hoping i'll get into it enough to go ahead and pursue learning how to play the guitar for real. i've been interested in it for awhile. But again, we'll see. I haven't had time or the ability to do so in the past.

My drawing is going alright so far. Thinking about going ahead and buying some books. Net is only helping so much.

Well, gonna finish my lunch and head back to work.

Just taking a couple of minutes real quick to update my journal. Since I'm suppose to be doing it every day anyways.

Basic rundown.. things are going well.. Ema and I have been spending a lot of time together over the past month. Talking and discussing things and trying to figure out how to work things out. We are probably going to be getting back together. so I'm very excited. We've hit a couple of snags but talked them over and its ok.

So our next step is moving back in together. I'm very excited. I'm ready to be together again. I still have some concerns but I am hoping we can resolve them together.

I'm going to say this even though it will go against my counceling. But I think it needs to be said to get it off my chest..

-Problems---
-she still makes this whole seperation sound like it is my fault. I will not deny that, yes I'm the one that drew the line and 'kicked her out'. but she has contributed to the position we are in as well.

-still has responsibility issues. such as keeping things clean and picking up after herself. doesn't see this as a problem. all I can do is hope it gets better because nothing I say is going to change it. I can't.. only she can..

-she is jobless again. whether this one was her fault or not I don't know. but she doesn't feel that this time was or any others.

-Improvements---
-Adult time has been good. even though we don't do 'anything'. watching movies or goofing with games on yhe consoles.

-being acknowledged when we are at her family's house.

-won't know how well shes doing on consideering what I want, or how often we play, or some other random things until we actually move in together. though we have had a couple snags where she has kind of blown off what I want or what I had to say... but I ignored it.. so we will see I guess. (GH3, riding lawn mower, her comment on my credit card bills)

Well that is mostly what I wanted to say. Lunch time is over so I need to get back to work.

See everyone on the other side...

Sorry i've been out for a few days.  Haven't had internet since Wednesday morning. Plus I actually spend the night with Ema most of the week. Spent time together, Got close, snuggled, loved, watched tv, movies, laughed, giggled, and had a good time. That didn't involve sex, arguing, or seperation. It was a great week.

I finally was able to buy the phone I have been wanting so I can have my PDA and my phone in one device. So maybe I can get my life back together again. It's gonna be nice... can't wait for it to get here.

For some reason, still listening to 70s,80s music??? not sure whutsup with that. Probably from listening to it so much with my Dad.  Currently listening to Def Leopard and Bon Jovi. Probably my 2 top favorites, followed by Journey.

Well just figured i'd write in here for the night. It's been a great week. Hope you had fun to. But the dreams are over and it's back to reality.

Have a good night Journ.

Wow... I can't believe i'm sitting here crying. Going through songs I used to listen to. You got to love the classics. I ended up settling on REO SpeedWagon - Keep on Loving You.  http://www.myspace.com/mad20dog2004 <-- MySpace page. Things are looking up. I feel much better since i've been posting in my journal. It has some good stuff and some bad stuff. Hopefully good stuff will continue to overrule the bad. I was going to go skating last night but ended up just staying home. I'm tired but I can't quit thinking about Ema. It's one of those where you really tired but don't feel it or can't sleep. Things seem to be getting so much better over the past couple of weeks. I talked to my counselor on Thursday and that helped a lot. I got some ideas and things to better my life and those around me. So, goodbye bad attitude and bottled up anger, and hello to happiness and joy inside out. I am so anxious now. I know things can only get better from here. Stay on the positive side. Apparently we are going to attempt for me to come spend the night with Ema a couple of nights this week. I just hope either she pushes things a step forward OR that I don't screw up. I'm going to enjoy being able to lay next to her again. It's going to be beautiful. I can't wait. I will hopefully have an added surprise but I don't know yet due to financials. But I really hope i'm able to get it  :) My funny for the day. My son decided to be a goof a put the blanket over his head and walk around the living room. The first thing that happened was he bumped into the China cabinet. Didn't even hesitate, backed up, and started walking again. Then runs into a wall. Deciding that I should probably make him take the blanket off his head before I laughed to death, I got up and took the blanket off of him and picket him up to look at his head and make sure he was ok. He just kind of looked at me and giggled and so I put him back down and took the blanket back to the couch. I found him later running around the house with it on his head again. But this time, he would take a few steps, stop, lift the blanket up a little bit then walk some and put it back down before continuing. LOL.. he is his mothers son, that is for sure. Well that's really all I have to post tonight. Overall things are on the up and up. I hope they stay that way.

Not alot happened today.  Didn't talk to Ema, didn't play any games, didn't do any work. I pretty just laid in bed and thought about stuff. I did however get to talk to Aiden for a little while... silly kid.

I don't know what to do. I'm waiting for her to decide whether or not it's worth us getting back together to her and it's killing me during that time. Once the decision is made i'll be able to get over whichever the result is. If we get back together then i'll be the happiest man alive. If not then I can at least move on with life. Instead, i'm waiting each day just hoping that she is going to say yes. Kind of like the anxiety you get when your about to ask the woman of your dreams to marry you. Right now, I'm hoping that she is going to decide/see and say yes after I talk to my counselor on Thursday. But when Thursday comes around and she doesn't, it will just put me back in the same spot again. And i'll just keep trying to do what I can. I received a text message from her late last night though because she had one of those concerned "mommy feelings". So I called to make sure she was alright and a little while later she sent me this exact text message: "It means a lot to me that you called to check on me. Talking to you does make me feel better." So that what a good feeling. I just hope we can get back together and I can continue to do that for her for the rest of our lives.

Well I figured out one way I can do my journal updates.  Since I carry my laptop with me everywhere anyways. I have this nifty little addon to firefox that allows me to post to livejournal without actually having to login and go to livejournal.com website. So I can type in what I want to post about my day while i'm on breaks and lunch at work, then all I have to do when I get home is add any last details I missed or vents about work, and hit "Post". This way I get my post in more often.

Well, Ema isn't going to be happy with me. I didn't call the counselor yesterday like I said/was going to. I got most of my other stuff done. I got some good rest, took a shower, then bathed Mica, so Mica is clean, brushed, nails clipped, and my room is clean. Got my checkbook half balanced. Didn't get to finish that. Had to leave for work. Didn't get to play my game I have to return tomorrow though :(   Oh well. Games aren't important right now. Shoot, I haven't touched my games or computer in almost 2 weeks or so until yesterday. I stayed the night at my brothers house while mom was out of town, and played my Wii with my brother and sister all night and most of the next day. We rented a multiplayer game we could play that I have to take back sometime Monday.

So I guess other than that. Not much going on. The rest of the night I was working, training and talking about geek stuff.

------------------------------

2nd update for the night. I called Ema on lunch and it didn't go well. I'm happy to find out that she isn't getting any further away from us being together, but we aren't getting any closer either. We are still in the same as we were is what she said. I am going to talk to my counselor this morning. I think i'll be awake enough to do so. 

Apparently because we have seperate checking accounts her money and what she spends is no longer any of my business. To me, as long as I have a valid marriage license with both our names on it, everything is my business as it is her's for me. So she re-worded it to, I don't have any control over what she spends her money on. Well... that's a problem to. The objective behind seperate checking accounts was not to make it so we can blow money without each other knowing or being able to say anything about it. It was done to help the responsibility of both of us, also to allow us to save up money for things we want, yes, but, that should not exclude the respect of talking about it BEFORE buying it.

Well... My night is over and i'm back at home. Time to call the counselor and head to bed. Wish me luck. I will probably post the conversation. But as mentioned before, will probably be a private post.

I like venting in it simply due to that and music are how I tend to keep my attitude, temper, mood, etc in check. I let it out through music mostly. But in the famous words of a favorite movie, Fuck it, i'm just going with it.

So my job will slow down to almost 1/4 of our call volume divided amongst 4 techs. Will be interesting.

Ema sent me a text specifically saying that she wants me back, but she's scared. She says that if I don't there's no chance that we will get back together. But if I do then it will look good to her and be a right step.
